Fishing Guild Member Klaus:
I'm Klaus, a member of the Fishermen's Guild. I'm the fishing specialist in these parts!
The region of Goddard is very mountainous and has many lakes brimming with high-quality fish! Skilled fishermen come here seeking diversity and a challenge. Some even fish in the hot springs to the north!
Ask how to fish.
